title: Bug 14047: StyledText inefficient redraw during text change with word wrap
description: Appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode results in N redraws of the entire client area.
OB: When appending N lines to StyledText in word wrap mode, the entire client area is being redrawn N times.
SR:
Steps to reproduce: 
1. Enable word wrap mode in the StyledText component.
2. Append N lines of text to the StyledText component.
3. Observe the redraw behavior of the entire client area.
